title: How did the 5G network get developed? - Quora

response.answer_text: 5G is a natural evolution of the wireless network standards - following 2G, 3G and 4G. 5G supports upto 1 Gbps network speed. 2G was for text / phone calls, 2.5G was for emails, 3G was for web, 4G was for video and 5G is for use cases such as Augmented Reality, Virtual Reality, Fixed Wireless and Robotic Surgeries.
